EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Spring Days_Q217.Atlanta Post Event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending Spring Days Atlanta 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello there,
Thanks for coming out, participating, and being part of the community last week in Atlanta. Please take this survey <[[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1w2SMHxqqOGp_IEGPNvQsDO1ltXIFcb9EfReiy8iIX04/edit]]> so we can improve the event, we want you to recommend it to your co-workers!
Looking for slides from Spring Days? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring Days here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/spring-days-atlanta?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>.
Network and learn from Spring community leaders at SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[http://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>, December 1-4 in San Francisco. Take $100 off your SpringOne Platform ticket by using S1P_EVENT_SD100 when you register!
In the meantime, get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation.
I hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=springdays-2017]]>!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>
